name: The Holy Milk
description:
Dear Player,

You have to steal the Holy Milk, but the Holy Milk Company employees have placed a lot of fake milks in their offices. You have the ability to see the real milk: Instinct. Use your Instinct power to see the real milk, but use it wisely as it doesn't regain. The enemies might also get suspicious of you, but you can use the Instinct power to disguise yourself. Use the Instinct carefully.

- Unknown Person,

CEO of the Fresh Milk Company

Created by NitroGEN14 for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

Music by G3 Carnage: 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzP8NMYDikwiSeKkawiKXgg
